title: The Tale of the Body Thief
description: Vampire-hero, rockstar and seducer of millions Lestat is an immortal extraordinaire . . But Lestat yearns to be reborn a mortal. Tormented to the depths of his vampire should he wanders aimlessly across the globe, from Amsterdam to the Amazon jungle, until he meets the one being who can grant him his wish. He is the "Body Thief" more sinister and evil than any daemon. But when Lestat surrenders his vampire body he discovers what he'd so long ago forgotten: the awkwardness and anguish of being human . . .--back cover
author: Anne Rice
